creditline: The John R. Van Derlip Fund
department: Chinese, South and Southeast Asian Art
description:
One of four wall hangings of embroidered deep blue satin.  Each has a design of two of the Eight Immortals.  Floral sprays and boughs in the ground.  Satin and knot stitch in shades of green, blue, peach, pink, red, yellow, and tan.  Border of gold and salmon-color brocade with design of symbols and dragon medallions.
Former Classification: Textiles - Tapestry
title: Panel, one of a set of four
